question: Mokhadaji Gohil , a Gohil Rajput ruler of Ghogha, near Bhavnagar was a contemporary of which of the following Sultans?
option1: Ghiyas ud din Tughluq Shah I
explanation: Mokhadaji Gohil , a Gohil Rajput ruler of Ghogha, near Bhavnagar were a contemporary of Muhammad bin Tughluq. Their reign was in 13th century.
